name: The Holy Church Begins with Bestowal of Blessings
summary: Humanity cannot survive without faith.But here, faith is, but a tool wielded by nobles to exploit the commoners.Accompanied by a luminous entity capable of bestowing commandments, Corleon arrived in this world.His enemies call him a demon who harvests souls in the name of faith.His followers call him the Heavenly Father, who brings truth and liberates the souls.Starting out with the mere wish to secure a safe and free home in this turbulent and dangerous world, Corleon's tale began.
author: Marctempest
